content: kevin1027sloth: Opened one pull request (#1752 "fix") that remains unmerged, making substantial code changes across 26 files (+1101/-2 lines). Activity was sporadic, occurring on only 2 days this month, with contributions split between code (50%) and configuration files (38%). The work appears to be entirely focused on bug fixes, though the specific nature of the fix isn't detailed in the PR title.
